title: Ramos Coelho (José)
body: This well-known writer, now deceased, published a pamphlet in 1898, entitled A ilha da Madeira, which is a poetic composition extolling the natural beauties of this island and which is also included in his *Complete Works* (Lisbon, 1910). Ramos Coelho visited Funchal in his youth to study some old documents from the house of the Count of Carvalhal.

Ramos Coelho: Author of the pamphlet *A ilha da Madeira*

1898: Publication of the pamphlet *A ilha da Madeira*
